item.title: The discovery leads to drugs targeting dozens of types of cancer
item.description: By turning off genes one by one, researchers from the United Kingdom and the United States have targeted cancer with new drugs. The author, Sean Lintern, said in a report in the British newspaper “The Independent”, that scientists have made an important step towards developing new drugs that target specific genes within dozens of types of cancer.
